Class MiniFig

  • java.lang.Object
    • MiniFig

  • public class MiniFig
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a MiniFig graphical object.

    Author:
    Luke Hindman

    • Constructor Detail

      • MiniFig

        public MiniFig(java.awt.Graphics canvas,
               int midX,
               int topY)
        Constructor for a new MiniFig with a fixed size
        Parameters:
        canvas - Graphics canvas on which to draw the MiniFig
        midX - X component of the MiniFig anchor point, located at the top, center of the MiniFig
        topY - Y component of the MiniFig anchor point, located at the top, center of the MiniFig

      • MiniFig

        public MiniFig(java.awt.Graphics canvas,
               double scaleFactor,
               int midX,
               int topY)
        Parameters:
        canvas - Graphics canvas on which to draw the MiniFig
        scaleFactor - Decimal scaler to resize MiniFig
        midX - X component of the MiniFig anchor point, located at the top, center of the MiniFig
        topY - Y component of the MiniFig anchor point, located at the top, center of the MiniFig

      • MiniFig

        public MiniFig(java.awt.Graphics canvas,
               java.awt.Point anchor)
        Constructor for a new MiniFig with a fixed size
        Parameters:
        canvas - Graphics canvas on which to draw the MiniFig
        anchor - The MiniFig anchor point is located at the top, center of the MiniFig

      • MiniFig

        public MiniFig(java.awt.Graphics canvas,
               double scaleFactor,
               java.awt.Point anchor)
        Constructor for a new MiniFig with a fixed size
        Parameters:
        canvas - Graphics canvas on which to draw the MiniFig
        scaleFactor - Decimal scaler to resize MiniFig
        anchor - The MiniFig anchor point is located at the top, center of the MiniFig

        public void setHeadColor(java.awt.Color headColor)
        Change the color of the MiniFig head to the specified value. MiniFig must be redrawn for the color change to take affect.
        Parameters:
        headColor - the headColor to set

      • getHeight

        public int getHeight()
        Get the total height of the MiniFig, measured from the top of of the knob to the bottom of the feet.
        Returns:
        the total height of MiniFig

      • getWidth

        public int getWidth()
        Get the total width of the MiniFig, measured from the outside edge of the right hand to the outside edge of the left hand.
        Returns:
        the total width of MiniFig

      • getTopMidPoint

        public java.awt.Point getTopMidPoint()
        Get the Point (x,y) representing the top middle of the MiniFig. This Point is actually the same as the anchor point that is specified when the MiniFig is created.
        Returns:
        a point along the middle axis of the MiniFig at the top

      • getBaseMidPoint

        public java.awt.Point getBaseMidPoint()
        Get the Point (x,y) representing the bottom middle of the MiniFig.
        Returns:
        a point along the middle axis of the MiniFig at the base
